trans-unit.source: Specifies the design-time editor of the expression builder.
This class cannot be inherited.
The ExpressionEditorAttribute class specifies the design-time expression editor for the expressions that are handled by an <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder> class.
When editing a control property, you can set the property value to an expression by using an editor for the expression.
When developing an expression builder, you can mark the builder with the ExpressionEditorAttribute attribute to set the editor type value.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute"></xref> class using the specified type name.
Use the ExpressionEditorAttribute constructor to initialize an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute> class using a type name.
To initialize the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute> class using a type object, use the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
The name of the type to associate with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor"></xref>.
typeName is ( in Visual Basic).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute"></xref> class using the specified type object.
Use the ExpressionEditorAttribute constructor to initialize an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute> class using a type object.
To initialize the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute> class using a type name, use the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
The type reference to associate with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor"></xref>.
Used by an expression editor to retrieve the editor type name.
Use the EditorTypeName property to retrieve the name of the type of editor that is associated with this instance of the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute> class.
The name of the editor type.
Indicates whether this instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute"></xref> class and a specified object are equal.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute"></xref> class or a class that derives from it.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if value is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> and <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute.EditorTypeName*> is equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Retrieves the hash code for the value of this <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute"></xref> attribute.
The value of an <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute> attribute is the value of its <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute.EditorTypeName%2A> property.
The hash code of the value of this <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute"></xref>.
